content: The error also mentions 'relay.' Click 'account settings' and on the account page, look at bottom row where it identifies the SMTP server. Is it showing that email address? The concern is that you have multiple addresses and each one must use its own SMTP server. Check to be sure that this account is using that SMTP server. Otherwise, check with email provider to verify what specific authentication is required.

content: The font needs to be installed into the operating system, not Thunderbird. Reminder: If used with HTML messages, your recipients will see your mail in their own font if they do not have that font installed. If your intent is for your own viewing, then set the font in Settings>General, and leave settings>composition font to 'variable width.' That ensures that recipients see messages in their chosen font, not yours.
